channel.title: Azure Monitor on AI SYSTEMS TODAY
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Monitor on AI SYSTEMS TODAY

item.title: Azure Technologies for Effective Platform Engineering
item.description: Learn about Azure’s tools and services essential for building robust platforms. In the dynamic world of software development, platform engineering has become a cornerstone for delivering high-quality software efficiently and reliably. Microsoft Azure, with its comprehensive suite of cloud services, stands out as a critical enabler of platform engineering. This blog delves into the role of Azure technologies in platform engineering, highlighting how they enhance productivity, support DevOps, and drive innovation.
